content: create your own stylish statement piece with this modern granny square sweater pattern perfect for all skill levels this pdf crochet pattern features a detailed granny square yoke paired with a trendy granny stitch body perfect for using up your yarn stash and being creative with colour *please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english not a finished product **pattern features ** adult sizes xs to 5xl 30-62 chest ensure the perfect fit for every body type skill level intermediate stitch granny stitch instant pdf download adjustable length sleeves and styling options full video tutorial to support written pattern if you are a visual learner us crochet terms uk stitch conversion chart **why you ll love this pattern ** versatile design customize with optional sleeves and choose between cuff styles adjustable length easily modify the length of the body to suit your preference detailed instructions 25-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear easy-to-follow guidance **materials needed ** category 3 or 4 dk/light worsted yarn i used hayfield bonus dk 100% acrylic with 306yds/100g crochet hook 4 5mm g+ or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern yarn needle scissors 2 stitch markers **pattern includes ** detailed instructions over 25 page ebook stitch guide sizing chart/schematic yoke stitch diagrams colour inspiration page full video tutorial customisation guide **instant download ** start crocheting your own unique sweater today purchase includes immediate access to the 25-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms **gauge ** 16sts and 8 row = 4 by 4 over a double_crochet granny stitch bring a modern twist to the classic granny square with this versatile jumper pattern whether you re crafting for yourself or a loved one this design offers endless possibilities for personalization and creativity **need help ** we re here for you contact us anytime for pattern support or questions note this listing is for a digital download pdf pattern not the finished sweater due to the nature of digital downloads no refunds will be issued © 2024 hanjan crochet ltd all rights reserved this pattern and its content are protected by copyright laws no part of this pattern may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means including photocopying recording or other electronic or mechanical methods without for personal use only it may not be used for commercial purposes without the express permission of hanjan crochet ltd finished items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities with credit given to hanjan crochet ltd for the design thank you for respecting the hard work and dedication that went into creating this pattern enjoy the timeless retro charm of granny squares with a contemporary flair download your pattern now and crochet your way to a one-of-a-kind wardrobe staple that everyone will love -
